longitude: Role: Feature, Description: A measure of how far west a house in california is; a higher value is farther west
latitude: Role: Feature, Description: A measure of how far north a house in california is; a higher value is farther north
housing_median_age: Role: Feature, Description: Median age of a house within a block; a lower number is a newer building
total_rooms: Role: Feature, Description: Total number of rooms within a block
total_bedrooms: Role: Feature, Description: Total number of bedrooms within a block
population: Role: Feature, Description: Total number of people residing within a block
households: Role: Feature, Description: Total number of households, a group of people residing within a home unit, for a block
median_income: Role: Feature, Description: Median income for households within a block of houses (measured in tens of thousands of US Dollars)
median_house_value: Role: Target, Description: Median house value for households within a block (measured in US Dollars)
ocean_proximity: Role: Feature, Description: Location of the house w.r.t ocean/sea
